enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve operations related to futures accounts and require the futures feature to be enabled for the sub-account.
Both methods involve querying or modifying futures account details, suggesting a similar setup or state change.
Accessing the futures position risk often follows a summary of the futures account, indicating a logical sequence of operations.
Transferring assets internally to a futures account might precede checking the position risk, as it affects the account balance and positions.
